name: Kansas Linux Fest
tagline: a Yearly Open Source (Free/Libre Open Source Software) and Open Knowledge Festival for Kansas
body:
### Welcome to the Kansas Linux Fest 
This is a project of the Free/Libre Open Source and Open Knowledge Association of Kansas (www.openkansas.us) and other organizations. 
We are still working on the board of directors for the conference and planning.
To sign up for more info, go to this page here. [sign up](https://sites.google.com/site/flosokaks/events-1/yearlyfreelibresoftwareconferenceinthesunflowerstate)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
